This project is a Vite + React website focused on Urban Mobility & Traffic and Public Safety & Emergency Response. Use Three.js for 3D UI elements related to traffic and vehicles. The design should be beautiful, elegant, and professional. Include login/register, main options, and feature pages as described in the requirements.
